sourcesContent: import*as o from"react";import{useUID as c}from"@twilio-paste/uid-library";import{IconWrapper as I}from"./helpers/IconWrapper";const l=({as:i,display:p,element:t="ICON",size:a,color:s,title:r,decorative:e})=>{const n=`ChevronDownIcon-${c()}`;if(!e&&r==null)throw new Error("[ChevronDownIcon]: Missing a title for non-decorative icon.");return o.createElement(I,{as:i,display:p,element:t,size:a,color:s},o.createElement("svg",{role:"img","aria-hidden":e,width:"100%",height:"100%",viewBox:"0 0 20 20","aria-labelledby":n},r?o.createElement("title",{id:n},r):null,o.createElement("path",{fill:"currentColor",fillRule:"evenodd",d:"M6.293 8.293a1 1 0 011.32-.083l.094.083L10 10.585l2.293-2.292a1 1 0 011.32-.083l.094.083a1 1 0 01.083 1.32l-.083.094-3 3a1 1 0 01-1.32.083l-.094-.083-3-3a1 1 0 010-1.414z"})))};l.displayName="ChevronDownIcon";export{l as ChevronDownIcon};
